name: Oddworld Collection
summary:
Oddworld: Collection is the oddest collection of all, and the complete Oddworld experience for Nintendo Switch!

Escape from a company that wants to turn you into delicious meat in the puzzle-platformer Oddworld: New ‘n’ Tasty, avoid extinction and soulless scientists in Oddworld: Munch’s Oddysee, and become a bounty hunter with mercy in the hybrid first- and third-person shooter Oddworld: Stranger’s Wrath.
